metadata.synopsis: A trio of Rivington locals complain about the way their letters have been treated by the local post-office. This is the male dwarf's one liner.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - go to 9.5;47.5; -20- Talk to the male dwarfHof the missing letters vignette.

0.speaker: Balgor
0.text: The cultists are on our doorstep, but no - the 'real' problem is the bloody post.

1.speaker: Balgor
1.text: Do me a favour? Box my ears in. I can't listen to any more whining about 'missing letters'.
